context_bundle.summary: Request/response pattern for synchronous agent communication with correlation IDs, timeout handling, and response polling

onboarding.quick_start: Agent A writes request with UUID to B's inbox, polls B's outbox for response with matching correlation ID, implements timeout
common_patterns: Request: Write req-{uuid}.json to target agent inbox
Response: Write resp-{uuid}.json to own outbox with correlationId
Polling: Check outbox every 500ms for matching correlation ID
Timeout: Abort after N seconds (default 60s) with error
Cleanup: Archive or delete processed request/response pairs
known_errors: Orphaned requests if responder crashes before replying
Timeout must be longer than expected processing time
